Hey guys !! 

GOT A SOLUTION FOR THE MISSING FILE !!


Alright, soo.. go to you're other sims 3 files. .. let's say go to:

 C:\Program File\Electronic Arts\Sims 3 VIP\Support

In there you will find the "fr-fr_EULA.rtf" ( Rich Text Format) file !!.. COPY IT

Go to the exctracted download game and PASTE IT in Download\The Sims3 Pets\Support\..

NOW

Relaunch the installation.. A popup box will show up at the same spot as where it asked for the CD before.. But just type IGNORE !! And Instal will complete ! 

Then crack the game and ENJOY !! :D

Alright, it worked for me (I forgot to crack, so I'm not sure if it makes it past the save selection screen):
I turned off my wifi connection.
Extracted the RAR to a new file on my desktop.
Followed the instructions of the fix posted in above comments.
Ran the setup.exe as an administrator.
Let it update my game.
Let it install.

And boom.

Hello,

@spystyle

Then I suggest you re-read the "Crack" -part in the "# Installation Guide.txt", because you have to copy the crack to the BASE GAME's installation folder and not the expansion's installation folder. If you copy it to the wrong folder, you'll keep getting the "Please insert Disk" error.


@anyZZ

It's not really a must, but I recommend you do, because without it, you can not update the game in the future.
If you wish to update in the future, just download and apply the latest version of this Fix: http://games4theworld.bestgoo.com/t752-the-sims-3-ultimate-fix-should-fix-most-of-your-problems


FOR EVERYONE ELSE GETTING THE "Please insert Disk 1..." error during the installation, just apply this Fix: http://games4theworld.bestgoo.com/t2251-the-sims-3-pets-please-insert-disk-1-official-fix-important
